settings.title: Carefully selected coffee through your door
settings.paragraph_message_1: Our subscription coffees are selected to showcase exceptional seasonal coffee that express their process and origin with clarity. This could be a coffee from our existing range, a preview of a new release, or a small micro-lot exclusive to our subscribers.
settings.paragraph_message_2: All subscription coffee is roasted to order and dispatched in a mailbox* friendly package every Wednesday.
settings.paragraph_message_3: *Height of mailbox package is 40mm, based on the average letterbox height in the UK*
